General.Name: Evertop Wire Cable Corp
General.Description: Evertop Wire Cable Corporation is involved in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of wires and cables in Taiwan. The company provides bare and electrical wires; and power, communication, optical fiber, solar, electrical hybrid, water-resistant type, and electric vehicle cables under the EVERTOP brand. Its products are used in the building infrastructure, such as offices, residences, schools, hospitals, and industrial parks; and public transportation, including subways, tunnels, high-speed rail systems, stations, and airports. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
